text.title: Texas student Ahmed Mohamed inspires social movement
text.head: Texas student Ahmed Mohamed inspires social movement

list.item: AP and USA Today. "Family withdraws Muslim teen from Texas school over clock trouble" — Toronto Star , September 22, 2015
